content.body: Sigh, GitHub moderation is the worst. When you get spam on a PR you cannot delete the comment. If you block the person before editing the comment to remove the spam, you cannot edit the comment until you first unblock the person. And reporting the comment still takes you through a needlessly long software wizard I'm no longer interested in using.
